name: Sam & Max Hit the Road
description:
This script will install any "Sam & Max - Hit the Road" PC classic edition for ScummVM.
During install please let all options by default.
Big thanks to people who gave their time to permit us playing this game in the best conditions.
notes:
- This script should support any "S&M-HTR" PC classic edition.
- This script will ask you for this files "SAMNMAX.SOU", "SAMNMAX.000"... You will find them in any "S&M-HTR" PC classic edition. Source: https://wiki.scummvm.org/index.php/Datafiles#Sam_.26_Max_Hit_the_Road.
- Please report issue concerning this script on my Github page:
https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/

script.custom-name: Sam & Max Hit the Road - PC classic editiob - ScummVM

content:
custom-name: Sam & Max Hit the Road - PC classic editiob - ScummVM
game:
  game_id: samnmax
  path: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- insert-disc:
    description: Please insert disc
    requires: MONSTER.SOU
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $DISC/SAMNMAX
scummvm:
  aspect: true
  fullscreen: true
